originalText.text: We could not have gone through our moms passing without MJHS staff in New York My mom laura was a fighter at 100 she still wanted to stay here with us but it was her time from Paula her nurse Alexa her social worker and all those involved they all helped her through each step not only for my mom but for us the family as well. They were awsome They gave more than 100%  There are no words i can say to thank them enough Nilsa

They were awsome They gave more than 100%  There are no words i can say to thank them enough Nilsa

originalText.text: Thank you MJHS for your care of and treatment for my late mother. Allowing her to pass peacefully at home made all the difference for her, and us. And your care and concern for her children during this difficult time. It's been over 6 months and you're still calling to make sure we're dealing with it ok. Best move we made was to discharge her into your care from her last hospital stay. The nurses there were angels, god bless them, but the doctors couldn't make her better and I believe they considered her untreatable (she'd been through a series of UTIs). Once home, your nurses came very quickly on those difficult days, and their care and concern was wonderful. I can only imagine how much more difficult it would have been had we been left to deal with her failing condition on our own. From the initial consultation months before, when you said she wasn't ready for hospice because she was responding to in home rehab and the possibility of improvement was still there, to the end when your doctor came very quickly, the time you spent with us was priceless. The information you so freely provided, at length and so many times, was extremely valuable in helping us understand and deal with the end of life process. Thank you thank you thank you.

originalText.text: 4 years ago this week, I began getting MJHS home care after open heart surgery. The surgeon told my doctor I had been very critical. I didn't realize I wouldn't be able to get out of bed by myself, & would have to learn how to walk again. A dear friend stayed with me, & saw the care I got from the nurse, aide & physical therapist, who all got me up & back in shape. God bless Team 4!

originalText.text:
The nurses,the social workers were wonderful with some much love and care for my mother up to the end.
Their professionalism were excellent
I would definitely recommend your services to anyone, even the priest was so lovely.

I would definitely recommend your services to anyone, even the priest was so lovely.

originalText.text:
My wife received excellent care from the aides, the nurse the social worker,
all of whom made it possible for her to remain in her home and to pass away in her bed with her family present.  Using MJHS was a better choice than a hospital in my wife's case.
